title: 2.8 Duty Free
description:
That fateful night, a perfume bottle, the truth about Flight 702.

Visit passengerlist.org to see a script and full list of credits for “Duty Free,” and join the investigation.

Passenger List Season 2 was created and directed by John Scott Dryden; sound designed by Steve Bond; with music by Mark Henry Phillips. “Duty Free” was written by John Scott Dryden. Passenger List is a proud member of Radiotopia, from PRX.

KAITLIN - Kelly Marie Tran
RORY - Ben Daniels
JIM - Rob Benedict
MARIANNE - Carlyss Peer
HALLIN- Kerry Shale 
CONOR - Akie Kotabe
MAI - Elyse Dinh
THOMAS - Colin Morgan

OTHER VOICES:
Laurel Lefkow, Christopher Ragland, Eric Meyers, David Menkin, Danielle Lewis, Karl Queensborough, Eric Sirakian, Chris Kelly, Maddy Kelly, Merk Nguyen.
itunes:subtitle: That fateful night, a perfume bottle, the truth about Flight 702.
